verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. They that trust<WH982> in Jehovah<WH3068> Are as mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726>, which cannot be moved<WH4131>, but abideth<WH3427> for ever<WH5769>.
As the mountains<WH2022> are round about<WH5439> Jerusalem<WH3389>, So Jehovah<WH3068> is round about<WH5439> his people<WH5971> From this time forth and for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>.

For the sceptre<WH7626> of wickedness<WH7562> shall not rest<WH5117> upon the lot<WH1486> of the righteous<WH6662>; That<WH4616> the righteous<WH6662> put not forth<WH7971> their hands<WH3027> unto iniquity<WH5766>.
Do good<WH2895>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, unto those that are good<WH2896>, And to them that are upright<WH3477> in their hearts<WH3826>.
But as for such as turn aside<WH5186> unto their crooked ways<WH6128>, Jehovah<WH3068> will lead them forth<WH3212> with the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205>. Peace<WH7965> be upon Israel<WH3478>.
